message:
SYSTEM: Enabling_ontology-based_Streaming_Data_Access2.pdf: Página 18
Query Translation
18
Enabling  Ontology-based Access to Streaming Data Sources
•
Queries: 
SELECT ?y 
WHERE
{ ?x a cd:Observation; 
cd:observationResult ?y. }
SELECT ?y
FROM STREAM < STREAM <http://www.semsorgrid4env.eu/ccometeo.srdf> 
[ NOW – 1 MINUTE TO NOW – 0 MINUTES ] >
WHERE
{ ?x a cd:Observation; 
cd:observationResult ?y. }
speaker: SYSTEM
